headline: Lemonade earnings, Hon Hai sales, Duke Energy $87B investment
summary: Julie Hyman recaps the top stories on Wall Street as part of Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. Lemonade (LMND) stock gains after second quarter earnings beat expectations. Hon Hai Precision (2317.TW) reports slowing sales growth during the month of July. Duke Energy (DUK) beats second quarter estimates as the company plans a multibillion-dollar investment in infrastructure. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Duke Energy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Duke Energy Corp. DUK) on Tuesday reported second-quarter earnings of $984 million. On a per-share basis, the Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had profit of $1.25.

headline: Duke Energy partners with Brookfield to secure investment in Duke Energy Florida, expands capital plan to $87 billion
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE: DUK) today announced it has entered into a definitive agreement for Brookfield, through its Super-Core Infrastructure strategy, to hold a 19.7% indirect equity interest in Duke Energy Florida for an aggregate amount of $6 billion. Brookfield is a leading infrastructure investor, with over $200 billion in assets under management across the utilities, transport, midstream and data sectors.
